snippet.title: Millie || Trailer
snippet.description:
You've always dreamed of flying. Roaming high in the clouds. Free from all worries. Just gliding like a bird. Well, you were born as a worm, and your only chance of launching to the sky is probably in some crows' mouth... or is it?
Local Aviation School is taking new recruits for a pilot course. Seeing an opportunity arise to make your dreams come true, you seize the moment and embark on a journey of your life. Your path is full of dangers, mazes and obstructions but the end goal is more than worth it!

So rise on your feet, all 100 of them, and get going!

Millie is a joyful, casual game. You control a millipede, roaming through over 90 elaborate mazes that require significant planning ahead. Various power-ups will help you with your struggles. As you play you grow bigger and bigger, so you need to plan ahead and make sure that you will make it.

- 96 challenging mazes to solve
- Tons of power-ups and helpers
- Varied and colorful levels
- Really enjoyable, casual gameplay
